page.title: 09Family Life (cont)
page.content: We have our evening meal about 5 o'clock,followed by the nightly argument of who did the washing up last, I usually disappear into the ilving room with a cup of coffee, Leaving my husband to sort out the situation. Unless the children have involved me in a meeting for cubs or guides, The rest of the evening in my own, Sometimes I sew or read or just watch televisions, perhaps do a spot of gardening if the weather is fine. I also belong to two ladies groups and I'm a non-singing member of our local operatic society, Three organisations usually take up a couple of nights a week. At about 11o'clock I make up the packed lunches for the next day and perhaps have a bite to eat for supper. I do tend to watch television until quite late, before going to bed.
